title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\CreateRecognizerRequest
name: CreateRecognizerRequest
description:
Request message for the [CreateRecognizer][google.cloud.speech.v2.Speech.CreateRecognizer] method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.CreateRecognizerRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: If set, validate the request and preview the Recognizer, but do not actually create it.

params.name: data.recognizer_id
params.description: The ID to use for the Recognizer, which will become the final component of the Recognizer's resource name. This value should be 4-63 characters, and valid characters are /[a-z][0-9]-/.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The project and location where this Recognizer will be created. The expected format is projects/{project}/locations/{location}.
